title: Great RINO deal - - granite, w/d, a/c, parking, wifi!
neighborhood: River North, RINO, Balllpark, near lodo
posting_body: FANTASTIC deal on a 2 bed in a  nice community - available mid September-  Parking and Wifi included !
off street parking and WIFI included
Walk 1 block over to the Source for great restaurants, brewery, meat, flowers, coffee!
1 off street parking space AND  WIFI - - is included in the rent
Give me a ring to tour this property or to find out about other places in Denver.
I have apartments all over the Downtown area from Lodo, Ballpark, Uptown, CBD, City Park, Riverfront, Commons Park, Lohi, West Highlands to Cherry Creek.
